original_title: How Do I Show the Ocean Space You Carried Inside You?
overview: The film explores the life and work of the Gujarati poet, playwright, director and actor Bhadrakant Zaveri, who was fatally injured in a bomb blast in 1993. Bharati Kapadia highlights the key features of their twenty-four-year relationship to highlight the transformative power of love and show that life and love take on many bodies.
title: How Do I Show the Ocean Space You Carried Inside You?
